nodes.text: Daschua was a location which was controlled by a military governor. One individual who served as the military governor of Daschua had several sons, the eldest of whom was named Zertik Strom and went on to serve in the Imperial Navy.

Daschua was first mentioned in the second entry of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, a pair of articles released in 2013 on the StarWars.com blog and written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley.
